title: PWNageTool.app Version 1.1 (Includes Bootloader Images)
description: This go around I included the usual bootloader images so it won&#039;t complain about not having them on iPhone IPSWBuild actions. Also new to this addition I included a minor tweak to the iPod 1.1.4 Firmware Payload which includes a SpringBoard patch to enable the January Update functionality upon installation as opposed to having iTunes enabled it when you set your iPod up after a restore. Enjoy.
